Hi! i’m Egor Rasel

Egor Nikolaevich Bulatkin (born June 25, 1994, Penza), better known as Yegor Creed, is a Russian singer, rapper, songwriter, and actor. He began his solo career in 2011 under the pseudonym "KReeD", now he performs under the name Yegor Creed. He is the author and performer of his own songs.

More about me.

Egor Creed received his first fame thanks to the Internet. In 2011, he posted on his VKontakte a song of his own composition - "Love on the Web" (originally it was called "The word" love "has lost its meaning"). With the help of friends, Yegor shot a video in 2 days, which gained a million views in a few weeks.
